item.title: Sometimes it's the simple things that are the most beautiful. After all, the clarinet part of Mendelssohn's Sonata in E-...
item.description: Sometimes it's the simple things that are the most beautiful. After all, the clarinet part of Mendelssohn's Sonata in E-flat Major is not particularly difficult (unlike the piano part). Interesting fact: he composed it at the young age of 15! We wish you all a peaceful Easter, full of happy and musical moments! *** https://www.henle.de/en/Clarinet-Sonata-E-flat-major/HN-1033 *** #henleverlag #urtext #henlelibrary #mendelssohn #clarinet

item.title: From Vienna to Berlin: While Schönberg had composed most of his Six Little Piano Pieces op. 19 in his home town, he pres...
item.description: From Vienna to Berlin: While Schönberg had composed most of his Six Little Piano Pieces op. 19 in his home town, he presumably completed them in Berlin and brought them to the stage there for the first time, performed by a student of Busoni. After the premiere in Berlin, he wrote in his diary in 1912: “Closson played the pieces much too fast. He forgot everything I told him. And in particular: no pause at all after a piece. So that nobody knew that it was six piano pieces.” *** With these pieces, the concentration on the essential is legendary, and the pause after each of the short pieces was so important to Schönberg that he had this annotation printed as a footnote on the first page of the first edition in 1913. Venture now into these miniatures, behind whose fleeting gestures lie hidden depths, shown especially through its supposed reference in the last piece to Gustav Mahler’s funeral on 21 May 1911! With carefully considered fingerings by Emanuel Ax [link in bio]. *** #henleverlag #urtext #sheetmusic #classicalmusic #classicalpiano #schönberg #schoenberg #pianopieces #atonality #emanuelax #pianist #classicalpianist @arnoldschoenbergcenter
item.dc:creator: henleverlag

item.title: This is where classical music and pop culture meet: the romantic drama "Brief Encounter" from 1945 used this famous pian...
item.description: This is where classical music and pop culture meet: the romantic drama "Brief Encounter" from 1945 used this famous piano concerto to express the contradictory feelings of the main characters. Frank Sinatra or the unforgettable Eric Carmen, who passed away only recently, as well as other musicians have been inspired by the enchanting themes and elegiac melodies of Rachmaninoff’s legendary Opus 18 for their own songs. “Rach 2” is for many the epitome of the Romantic piano concerto. Following its acclaimed premiere in Moscow in 1901, it proved to be a show-stopper around the globe, finally helping cement Rachmaninoff’s international reputation as a composer. Do yourself a favour and get the new piano reduction of Rachmaninoff’s Piano Concerto no. 2 – with fingerings by Marc-André Hamelin [link in bio]! * * * Orchestral score and parts are available from @breitkopfundhaertel. * * * #henleverlag #henlelibrary #urtext #sheetmusic #classicalmusic #pianoconcerto #piano #classicalpiano #rachmaninoff #rachmaninow #pianoconcertono2 #klavierkonzert #marcandréhamelin #briefencounter #franksinatra #ericcarmen
item.dc:creator: henleverlag

item.title: The young and award-winning Chinese cellist Yibai Chen has been using Henle Urtext editions since he was a child
item.description: The young and award-winning Chinese cellist Yibai Chen has been using Henle Urtext editions since he was a child – we are delighted to have him as one of our ambassadors, not only in his home country of China, but throughout the world. Here’s to good cooperation! *** Link to Beethoven’s Kreutzer Sonata (original version for violin) in bio *** Music video: L. van Beethoven, Violin Sonata A major op. 47 (Kreutzer-Sonata), III. Presto, arr. for Cello by Yibai Chen performed by: Yibai Chen, Cello and Boyang Shi, Piano, Live recording (1.9.2023) by Xinghai Concert Hall Recording Studio *** #henleverlag #henlelibrary #urtext #beethoven @yibaichencellist @byyanoshi #sheetmusic #classicalmusic #ambassador #cellist #cello #kreutzersonata #piano #pianist #yibaichen
item.dc:creator: henleverlag

item.title: "For my music, one must have time, it is nothing for people who have other things to do", wrote Arnold Schönberg into hi...
item.description: "For my music, one must have time, it is nothing for people who have other things to do", wrote Arnold Schönberg into his Berlin diary in 1912, after concert rehearsals of his "Six Little Piano Pieces", in which the interpreter had played too fast for Schönberg's taste. Yet over 100 years ago, life was certainly more leisurely, with no television or smartphones to distract one from the things they wanted to do. What's it like for you? Do you still devote time to music? Are there moments when you completely lose yourself in your playing, when you practise without looking at your watch, when you listen to music without doing anything else at the same time? *** Discover Schönberg's works, published by Henle, at the link in bio! *** #henleverlag #urtext #sheetmusic #classicalmusic #classicalpiano #schönberg #schoenberg #pianist #classicalpianist @arnoldschoenbergcenter
item.dc:creator: henleverlag

item.title: "Flower Drum" – the title of this piece conjures up wonderfully colourful associations, hinting at a whole world of vari...
item.description: "Flower Drum" – the title of this piece conjures up wonderfully colourful associations, hinting at a whole world of various traditions, dances and folk songs. Find out more about this piano piece by Qu Wei in our reel – and also explore other outstanding works by 20th-century Chinese composers in the new edition of Chinese Piano Music, edited and fingered by @janejingxian_xie [link in bio]. *** #henleverlag #urtext #sheetmusic #classicalmusic #chinesemusic #chinesecomposers #piano #pianist #quwei #flowerdrum #ChinesePianoMusic @shanghaiconservatoryofmusic #shanghaiconservatoryofmusic

item.description: Dear pianists aged 6 to 11, now it's your turn again to perform on our virtual stage! Join in this year's Henle piano competition on YouTube and play a piece from “Selected Piano Works” by Frédéric Chopin – you might win great prizes such as sheet music or a cash prize! We at Henle are looking forward to your musical contribution: Take part until May 1, 2024. . . . Details at the link in bio! . . . #henleverlag #henlepianocompetition #urtext #sheetmusic #classicalmusic #pianocompetition #piano #pianist #chopin #frédericchopin #musicschool #musicteacher #youngpianist #youngpianists #youngpianoplayer #youngpianotalents #youngpianistcompetition
